# citr

```{r, eval=F}
library("citr")
md_cite("Zhong 2021", bib_file = "ml-env.bib", in_paren=F)
```


# RefManageR

```{r setup, include = FALSE, cache = FALSE, eval=F}
library(RefManageR)
bib <- ReadBib("ml-env.bib", check = FALSE)
BibOptions(check.entries = FALSE, style = "markdown", cite.style = "authoryear", bib.style = "numeric")

# Citet(bib, "zhongMachineLearningNew2021", .opts = list(longnamesfirst = FALSE, hyperlink = "to.doc", super = TRUE))
NoCite(bib, "zhongMachineLearningNew2021")
```

# References

```{r results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
library(RefManageR)
bib <- ReadBib("ml-env.bib", check = FALSE)
BibOptions(check.entries = FALSE, style = "markdown", cite.style = "authoryear", bib.style = "authoryear")

NoCite(bib, "zhongMachineLearningNew2021")
NoCite(bib, "elithSpeciesDistributionModels2009")

PrintBibliography(bib, .opts = list(check.entries = FALSE, sorting = "ynt"))
```
